title: Full-Stack Web Development Bootcamp
description: React.js, Redux, Next.js for the front-end
Node.js, Express.js for the back-end
MySQL, MongoDB for the database
Git, GitHub, Heroku for version control

title: Barkeeping
description: Mixing and serving drinks
Waiting on guests
Collecting bill payments and maintaining checkout operations
Maintaining a sanitary environment

title: Receptionist
description: Checking guests in and out
Answering phones
Managing bookings and reservations

title: Translator
description: Interpretation to and from Arabic, English, German, Kurdish, and Turkish
Translations and preparation of informational materials
Engagement in a variety of fields including: medical, humanitarian, organizational, and logistical

title: Liaison Officer
description: Regular visits to IDP camps to examine their health-related situation and determine their needs
Documentation and reporting of circumstances
Organising mobile clinics in coordination with the head of the medical department
Reporting logistic needs to the logistic department manager
Oral and written translations and preparation of informational materials in Arabic, English and Turkish
Organization and implementation of patient transport
